span.span: Assists in paginating a form.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于支持内部分页的每个控件， 将创建一个对象并将其用于对控件的内容进行分页。For each control that supports internal pagination, an object is created and used to paginate the contents of the control. 此类用于 具有长文本长度的控件的类，如 、 或 。This class is used with the class for controls that have long text length, such as a , , or . 通常，你不会继承和修改此类，除非你想要创建自己的自定义分页。Normally, you would not inherit and modify this class unless you want to create your own customized pagination. 通常，您可以从类继承， 并扩展您自己的自定义属性和方法。More typically, you would inherit from the class and extend your own customized properties and methods.

span.span: Pagination

param.name: pager
param.span: 正在进行分页的控件的页导航。

span.span: The control pager for the control being paginated.
The control being paginated.

param.name: itemCount
param.span: 控件中要进行分页的总项数。

span.span: The total number of items in the control to be paginated.

param.name: itemsPerPage
param.span: 每页要显示的最大项数。

span.span: The maximum number of items to be displayed per page.

param.name: itemWeight

span.span: The weight to be assigned per item.

param.span: 如果控件将一个字符视为一项，则此值应该较小；如果控件将文本的一行视为一项，则此值应该较大。

span.span: If a control considers a character to be an item, this value should be small; if a control considers a line of text to be an item, this value should be larger.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持内部分页的 ASP.NET 移动控件还提供一种称为自定义分页的功能。ASP.NET mobile controls that support internal pagination also provide a feature called custom pagination. 通常，此类控件要求您提供其可以显示的所有数据。Normally, such controls require you to provide all the data that they can display. 开发人员指定属性中列表的总项数 。Developers specify the total number of items that are in the list in the property. 属性指定控件每页显示的项数。The property specifies how many items the control displays per page.

span.span: Pagination

related.span: 为移动控件设计和呈现概念

span.span: Designing and Rendering Concepts for Mobile Controls

summary.span: 获取当前页上第一个可见项的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the first visible item on the current page.

summary.span: 如果没有可见项，则返回值 -1。

span.span: Returns a value of -1 if no items are visible.
